She is requesting this loan to help her make improvements to her house, so her family can have better living conditions.Faatu will use the loan to iron roofing materials and cement. She will also use part of her loan to buy chemicals,bush-knives,tarpaulin and pickaxe for her business.Faatu joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy iron roofing materials , cement.,chemicals,bushknives, tarpaulin and pickaxe

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: Loreta is a 43-year-old married woman with eight children. She has a small plantation and grows cabbages, tomatoes, beans and cucumbers to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years.Loreta has requested a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, filings, bush knives and a rake. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012.  With her profits,Loreta hopes to improve her savings to support her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, filings, bush knives and a rake

loans.name: Temukisa

texts.en:
Temukisa is 42 years old, married, and has seven children. She makes and sells pastries and fried chicken with rice in her community, which she has been doing for many years.

Temukisa is requesting a loan from SPBD, which she will use to buy flour, sugar, dripping oil, baking soda, ripe bananas, rice, chicken, and gas. She plans to use her profits to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, dripping oil, baking soda, ripe bananas, rice, chicken, and gas

loans.name: Alofa

texts.en: Alofa is a 60-year-old woman who is married with twelve children. She has a small business, making and selling popsicles in her community. She has two years with this business. Alofa needs a loan to buy a freezer, foam cups, cordial, chinese lollies and sugar. She will use her profits to improve her business. Alofa joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, foam cups, cordial, chinese lollies and sugar

loans.name: Poutolu

texts.en: Poutolu is a 57-year-old single woman with 2 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams, and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 4 years. Poutolu has requested a loan to buy chemicals, knives, weed killer, axes, and rakes. She has been a member of SBPD since 2009. With her profits, Poutolu hopes to improve her business to gain more money to support her family and her children.(Sorry member's correct age is 57 not 25).

loans.use: to buy chemicals, bush knives, weed killer, axes, rakes, etc.

loans.name: Etelani

texts.en:
Etelani is 55 years old and married with four children. She runs a small business selling Samoan coconut biscuits in her community and has been doing this for 3 years.

Etelani has requested a loan to buy flour, dripping oil, sugar, coconuts, baking powder, and plastic bags. She joined South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) in 2012 to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings, Etelani will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, dripping oil, sugar, coconuts, baking powder and plastic bags

loans.name: Alaine

texts.en:
Alaine is a 26-year-old woman who is single with one child. She has a small business where she grows taro, bananas, cucumbers, tomatoes,  and yams. To earn extra income, she also has a second business printing elei (printed cloth) materials.

Alaine needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, rake, wheelbarrow, gloves,  and vegetable seeds, and an elei carved board and materials. She will use her profits to improve her businesses. Alaine joined SPBD in 2008 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, rake, wheelbarrow, gloves,  and vegetable seeds

loans.name: Koreti

texts.en:
Koreti is a 62-year-old single mother with two children. She runs a small business selling pancakes, donuts, and pies in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Koreti has requested a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, baking powder and dripping oil. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Koreti will provide for her family’s daily needs.

loans.use: to buy bags of flour, sugar, baking powder and dripping oil

loans.name: Mataniu

texts.en: Mataniu is a 46-year-old married woman with six children. She would like to extend her business selling handicrafts in her community or at the flea market. In order to do this, Mataniu needs a loan to buy dry pandanus leaves, string, materials, earrings, bangles, colour paint, kava bowls and Samoan weapons. She hopes to use her profits to save for family needs and buy more handicrafts for her flea market. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy dry pandanus leaves, string, materials, earrings, bangles, colour paint, kava bowls and  a Samoan weapon

loans.name: Lotomau

texts.en: Lotomau is 36 years old and married with one child. She runs a small business selling barbecue in her community and has been doing this for four years. She has requested a loan to buy a barbecue grill, chicken, mutton flaps, sausages, foam plates, tongs, soy sauce, tomato sauce and foil. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Lotemau will look at improving her business and also help her family and kids .

loans.use: to buy a barbecue grill, chicken, mutton flaps, sausages, foam plates, tongs, soy sauce, tomato sauce and foil

loans.name: Toaganamua

texts.en:
Toaganamua is a 39-year-old married woman  with 1 child. She runs a business selling assorted goods in her community. She has 5 years of experience. Toaganamua  requests a loan to buy chickens, canned fish, milk, toilet paper, noodles, sugar, rice, salt, flour, snacks, soft drinks, and cigarettes. She plans to use her profits to save for her family's needs and to improve her business. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2009.

loans.use: to buy chcikens, canned fish, milk, toilet paper, noodles, sugar, rice, salt, flour, snacks, soft drinks and cigarettes.

loans.name: Salote

texts.en: Salote is 42 years old and married with 5 children. She runs a small business selling meat bun in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. Salote has requested a loan to buy flour,baking powder,dripping oil and frying pan. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Salote will provide for family daily needs.

loans.use: to buy flour,baking powder,dripping oil and frying pan

loans.name: Asopaepae

texts.en:
Asopaepae is a 53-year-old married woman with eight children.

She has a small plantation and grows taro, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for six years. Asopaepae has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a backpack sprayer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, tarpaulin and empty water gallon.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2007. With her profits, Asopaepae hopes to improve her business and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a backpack sprayer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, tarpaulin and empty water gallon

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 37 years old and married, with four children. She has a small garden, where she plants cocoa beans in order to make and sell Samoan cocoa in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

Patricia needs a loan to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, larger containers, plastic bags and foam cups. She has been a member of SBPD since 2009. Patricia will use the profits from her sales to support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, larger containers, plastic bags and foam cups

loans.name: Herema

texts.en:
Herema is a 43-year-old married woman with one child. She runs a business selling a variety of goods in her community. She has three years of experience with this business. 

Herema has requested a loan to buy chicken, sausages, tinned fish, snacks, soft drinks, flour, sugar, rice, salt, onions, noodles and soy sauce. She plans to use her profits to save for family's daily needs and to buy more stock for her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2008.

loans.use: to buy stock for her store

loans.name: Kapeneta

texts.en: Kapeneta is a 41-year-old married woman with nine children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. Kapeneta has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, eggs, baking powder, dripping oil and a large frying pan. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Kapeneta will use her business profit to help her business and her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, baking powder, dripping oil and a large frying pan

loans.name: Luaupu

texts.en: Luaupu is a 35-year-old woman who is married with two children. She has a small business selling barbecue food in her community. Luaupu is asking for a loan to help her pay for her children's school fees. She will also use part of the loan to buy chicken, mutton flaps, sausages, foam plates, soy sauce, tomato sauce and foil. Luaupu joined SPBD in 2005 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy chicken, mutton flaps, sausages, foam plates, soy sauce, tomato sauce, foil and pay school fees

loans.name: Faimanifo

texts.en: Faimanifo is a 56-year-old married woman with eight children. She makes and sells apple pie in her community to earn a living. She has three years of experience with this business. Faimanifo needs a loan to buy flour, tins of pineapple, vanilla syrup and a new gas oven. She plans to use her profits to buy an electric oven for her business. Faimanifo has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

loans.use: to buy flour, tins of pineapple, vanilla syrup and a new gas oven

loans.name: Vaitoelau

texts.en: Vaitoelau is 47 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for two years. Vaitoelau has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, vanilla, dripping oil and a large container. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital.  Vaitoelau will use her profit for her family's weekly shopping.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, vanilla, dripping oil and a large container

loans.name: Loisi

texts.en:
Loisi is a 39-year-old married woman with five children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, yams, taamu, etc.. to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. 

Loisi has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, gloves and a backpack sprayer. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Loisi hopes to expand her house.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, gloves and a backpack sprayer

loans.name: Uputo

texts.en: Uputo is a married woman with three children. She has a small transportation business. She has been doing this business for two years. She needs a loan to buy new tires and shocks and renew her license. She will use her profits to maintain her vehicle in good condition. Uputo joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new tires and shocks and renew her license

loans.name: Siatuvai

texts.en:
Siatuvai is a 38-year-old married woman with five children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams, and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years.

Siatuvai has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a weedsprayer, a wheelbarrow, and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since January this year 2014. With her profits, Siatuvai hopes to earn more money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, a weedsprayer, a wheelbarrow, and chemicals

loans.name: Alomai

texts.en:
Alomai is 47 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling vegetables in her community and has been doing this for more than six years. 

Alomai has requested a loan to buy seeds, wire, bush knives, chemicals and a wheelbarrow. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Alomai will save more for her children's education and for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy seeds, wire, bush knives, chemicals and a wheelbarrow

loans.name: Faaselega

texts.en: "Faaselega is a 60-year-old married woman with 7 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 20 years. Faaselega has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, weedsprayer and a spade, and also to improve her house. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Faaselega hopes to support her family and to save for unexpected emergencies."

loans.use: to buy bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals,  weedsprayer and a spade.

loans.name: Fesilafai

texts.en: "Fesilafai is a 36-year-old married woman with 5 children. She has a small plantation and grows taros and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 7 years. Fesilafai has requested a loan to buy a weedsprayer, taro roots, bush knives, chemicals and a wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Fesilafai hopes to improve her plantation and to support her family financially."

loans.use: to buy a weedsprayer, taro roots, bush knives, chemicals and a wheelbarrow

loans.name: Momoe

texts.en: Momoe is 47 years old and married with six children. She has a plantation where she grows bananas, taros, and yams, which she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for ten years. Momoe needs a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, chemicals and a weed sprayer. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. Momoe will use the profits from her sales to pay for her children's education and to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, chemicals and a weed sprayer

loans.name: Kuini

texts.en:
Kuini is a 26-year-old married woman with one child. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. 

Kuini has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, a weed-sprayer and a spade. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. With her profits, Kuini hopes to support her family and to improve her plantation.

loans.use: to buy to buy bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, a weed-sprayer and a spade.

loans.name: Ario

texts.en:
Ario is a 33-year-old woman who is single with four children. She has a small laundromat business. She has been in this business for three years. 

Ario needs a loan to buy washing powder and a new washing machine. 

She will use her profits to improve her business. Ario joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy washing powder and a new washing machine.

loans.name: Vitolia

texts.en:
Vitolia is 35 years old and has a partner with one child. She makes and sells elei printed material to earn a living, and has been doing this for two years. 

Vitolia has requested a loan to buy materials, paint, brushes, stencils and designs. 

She plans to use her profits to pay for her child's education. She joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, paint, brushes, stencils, and designs.

loans.name: Failelei

texts.en: Failelei is a 58 year-old married woman with five children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yam, and banana to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Failelei has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since January of this year. With her profits, Failelei hopes to earn more money for her future plans.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, and chemicals

loans.name: Eseese

texts.en: Eseese is a 33 woman who is married with six children. She has a small taxi business. She has seven years experience with this business. Eseese needs a loan to buy new tires, a new paint and a new wind shield. She will use her profits to pay for her families weekly expenses. Eseese joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new tyres, paint, and a wind shield

loans.name: Deila

texts.en:
Delia is 28 years old and a single woman with three children. She runs a small business selling donuts and German buns in her community, and has been doing this for two years. 

Delia has requested a loan to buy bags of sugar and flour, yeast, cooking oil, baking powder, and a gas oven. 

She joined SPBD in January of this year, 2014, to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Delia will earn more money to help her family and for her future plans.

loans.use: to buy bags of flour and sugar, yeast, cooking oil, baking powder and a gas oven.

loans.name: Fuamoli

texts.en: Fuamoli is a 52 year-old widow with four children. She has a small business making and selling pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Fuamoli has requested a loan to buy sugar, flour, dripping oil, and baking powder. She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Fuamoli hopes to improve her business and help her children's education.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, dripping oil, and baking powder

loans.name: Akenese

texts.en:
Akenese is 28 years old and married with four children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for five years. 

Akenese needs a loan to buy a weed sprayer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, fertilizer and a spade. 

She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. Akenese will use the profits from her sales to support her family and to pay for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, fertilizer and a spade.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en: Elena is a 37-year-old woman who is married with three children. She has a small tailoring business. She has three years experience with this business. Elena needs a loan to buy a new sewing machine, thread, needles and material. Elena joined SPBD in 2002 to gain access to financial services. She will use her profits to help with her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, thread, needles and material.

loans.name: Pesi

texts.en: Pesi is a 41-year-old married woman with six children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for eight years. Pesi has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, chemicals and shovels. She has been a member of SPBD since 2005. With her profits, Pesi hopes to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, chemicals and shovels.

loans.name: Marryanne

texts.en: Marryanne is a 22-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Marryanane has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, a weed sprayer and a spade. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Marryanne hopes to save more for her children's education and to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, a wheelbarrow, chemicals, a weed sprayer and a spade.

loans.name: Matasini

texts.en: Matasini is a 31-year-old partner woman with two children. She makes and sells fish in her community to earn a living. She has five years of experience with this business. Matasini needs a loan to buy fishing gear, fishing line and snorkeling boots. She plans to use her profits to help her family. Matasini has been a member of South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) since 2012.

loans.use: to buy snorkeling boots, fishing gear and fishing line

loans.name: Aniva

texts.en: Aniva is a 47-year-old divorced woman with six children. She catches and sells fish in her community to earn a living. She has four years of experience with this business. Aniva needs a loan to buy a spear, a torch, snorkeling boots and a fishing line. She plans to use her profits to support her family and pay her children's school fees. Aniva has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment

loans.name: Leafa

texts.en: Leafa is a 35-year-old widow with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and banana to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Leafa has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, chemicals and more. She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. With her profits, Leafa hopes to extend her business and pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, a weedsprayer, chemicals and seeds

loans.name: Lea

texts.en: Lea is a 43-year-old married woman with four children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 10 years. Lea has requested a loan to buy a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives, a spade, a rake and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Lea hopes to save more to pay her children's education and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow, bush knives, a spade, a rake and chemicals

loans.name: Tapusa

texts.en: Tapusa is a 46-year-old woman who is single with two children. She runs a sewing business in her community. She has three years of experience in this business. Tapusa has requested a loan to buy thread, needles, scissors,and fabrics. She plans to use her profits to extend her business and pay for her children's school fees. She joined SPBD in two years to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy needles, a scissor, thread, and fabrics

loans.name: Logovaita

texts.en: Logovaita is a 36-year-old single woman with 3 children. She has a small plantation and grows taamu, taro, yams, and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. Logovaita has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, and axe. She has been a member  of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Logovaita hopes to save money to support her family as well.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings, and an axe for her plantation

loans.name: Fetu

texts.en:
Fetu is a 53 year old married woman with 7 children.  She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas, yams, etc to earn a living.  She has been doing this for 5 years.  

Fetu has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, chemicals, bush-knives and boots.  She has been a member of SPBD since 2009.  With her profits, Fetu hopes to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, chemicals, bushknives and boots

loans.name: Tina

texts.en:
Tina is 42 years old and married with two children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as sugar, salt, flour, lollies etc. She has been doing this for many years. 

Tina needs a loan to buy boxes of lamb, chicken, bags of sugar, salt, flour, noodles, snacks and soft drinks. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy boxes of lamb, chicken, bags of sugar, salt, flour, noodles, snacks and soft drinks.

loans.name: Tomua

texts.en:
Tomua is 52 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for many years. 

Tomua has requested a loan to buy a fishing net, fishing gear and a new canoe. 

She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Tomua will support her family and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net, fishing gear and a new canoe.

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie is 22 years old and has two children with her partner. She runs a small business selling cup&bowl noodles, coffee etc. in her community and has been doing this for two years. 

Julie has requested a loan to buy noodles, coffee mix, sugar, milk and foam cups. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Julie will expand her business.

loans.use: to buy noodles, coffee mix, sugar, milk and foam cups.

loans.name: Tulipe

texts.en: Tulipe is 54 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling soft drinks in her community and has been doing this for many years. Tulipe has requested a loan to buy more sodas, coolers and a tarpaulin. She joined SPBD to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Tulipe will extend and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more sodas, coolers and a tarpaulin.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is 34 years old and lives with her partner of ten years and three children. She runs a small business selling ice cakes in her community, and has been doing this for many years. She has requested a loan to buy plastics, foam cups, sugar, vanilla and cordials. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Maria will improve and extend her business.

loans.use: to buy plastics, foam cups, sugar, vanilla and cordials.

loans.name: Fiatagata

texts.en: Fiatagata is 39 years old and married with six children. She owns and operates a small store selling items such as soaps, frozen food, snacks, drinks,  etc. She has been doing this for two years. Fiatagata needs a loan to buy boxes of tinned fish, corned beef, noodles, milk, soy sauce, mosquito coils, sugar, flour, salt and rice. She hopes to use her profits to extend and improve her business and support her children's education. She became a member of SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell

loans.name: Uaina

texts.en: Uaina is 42 years old, and married with three children. She runs a small business selling BBQ in her community, and has been doing this for many years. Uaina has requested a loan to buy boxes of chicken, chicken wings, sausages, a BBQ grill and soy sauce. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Uaina will pay for her children's education and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy boxes of chicken, chicken wings, sausages, a BBQ grill and soy sauce

loans.name: Susana

texts.en: Susana is 58 years old and married with seven children. She runs a small business making and selling meat buns in her community and has been doing this for many years. Susana has requested a loan to buy boxes of chicken, soy sauce, flour, garlic, onions, and a large pot. She joined SPBD in 2007 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Susana will improve/extend her business.

loans.use: to buy boxes of chicken, soy sauce, flour, garlic, onions, and a large pot

loans.name: Suipi

texts.en: Suipi is 47 years old, single and has three children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for more than seven years. Suipi has requested a loan to buy bags of sugar and flour, oil and a gas oven and other ingredients for her business. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Suipi will continue to enjoy making her business grow to improve her family's lives especially her kids.

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar and flour, oil, and a gas oven

loans.name: Manua

texts.en: Manua, a 28-year-old married mother of one child, has been operating a taxi service for several years. She is now requesting a loan to pay for new parts for her taxi, seat covers, tyres, oil and registration renewal. She will use her profits to provide for her family's daily needs and to improve her business. Manua joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to pay for new parts for her taxi, seat covers, tyres, oil and registration renewal

loans.name: Ala

texts.en:
Ala is a 56-year-old married woman with three children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro crops, banana crops, etc to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Ala has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, a crowbar, a backpack sprayer and bushknives. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2008. With her profits, Ala hopes to save more for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, a crowbar, a backpack sprayer and bushknives

loans.name: Lupe

texts.en:
Lupe is a 46-year-old woman who is married with six children. She has a small business providing taxi services. She has had many years with this business. 

Lupe needs a loan to buy new tires, seat covers, chemicals and a vacuum. She will use her profits to provide for her family's daily needs. Lupe joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new tires, seat covers, chemicals and a vacuum

loans.name: Palolo

texts.en:
Palolo is a 37-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows crops including taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Palolo has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, tarpaulin, a backpack sprayer, a crowbar and a pickaxe. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Palolo hopes to provide her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, tarpaulin, a backpack sprayer, a crowbar and a pickaxe

loans.name: Popoai

texts.en:
Popoai is a 36-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro crops, banana crops, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Popoai has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, empty water gallons, a crowbar, bush-knives and a backpack sprayer. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. With her profits, Popoai hopes to provide for her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, empty water gallons, a crowbar, bush-knives and a backpack sprayer

loans.name: Sesilia

texts.en:
Sesilia is a 49-year-old married woman with three children. She has a small plantation and grows taro crops, banana crops, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Sesilia has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, and a backpack sprayer. She will also use part of her loan to buy cement, iron roofing and timber for her home improvement. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Sesilia hopes to provide her family with everyday needs and to help her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a backpack sprayer, cement, iron roofing and timber.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en: Fatima is a 46 years old and single with six children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for three years. Fatima has requested a loan to buy oil, bags of flour, sugar, yeast, baking powder, etc. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fatima hopes to save the profits for her children's education and to support her family as well.

loans.use: to buy forks, oil, bags of flour, sugar, etc.

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is 32 years old and a married woman with five children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for six years. 

May has requested a loan to buy a bag of sugar and flour, oil, and a gas oven for her business. 

She joined SPBD in January of this year to gain access to capital. May will use her earnings to support her family and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a bag of sugar and flour, oil, and a gas oven.

loans.name: Tasuli

texts.en: Tasuli is a 54-year-old married woman with 8 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community, and has been doing this for 3 years. Tasuli has requested a loan to buy oil, a bag of flour, sugar, forks, a gas oven, frying pans, containers etc. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Tasuli hopes to save money to improve her business and support her family.

loans.use: to buy oil, a bag of flour, sugar, forks, a gas oven, frying pans, and containers for her business

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is 21 years old, a single woman with two children. 

She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community, and has been doing this for six years. 

Jessica has requested a loan to buy a bag of sugar, flour, oil, and a gas oven for her business. 

She joined SPBD in January this year to gain access to capital. 

With her earnings, Jessica will develop her business to help her family and save for emergencies.

loans.use: to buy a bag of sugar, flour, oil, a gas oven, etc.

loans.name: Taumaloto

texts.en: "Taumaloto is a 63-year old married woman with 13 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas, yams, etc to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than four years. Taumaloto has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives filings, an axe, etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Taumaloto hopes to save money to support her family and for emergencies."

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives filings, an axe, etc.

loans.name: Aiga

texts.en: Aiga is a 40-year-old married woman with four children. She has a small plantation and grows taamu, yams, bananas and taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. Aiga has requested a loan to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, chemicals, etc. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. With her profits, Aiga hopes to extend her business and support her family.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer and chemicals, etc.

loans.name: Timenata

texts.en: Timenata is a 23-year-old married woman with two children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. Timenata has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, bush knives, filings and an axe, spade and wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Timenata hopes to save money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy weed sprayer chemicals, bush knives, filings and an axe, spade and wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Mile

texts.en:
Mile is 44 years old, married, and has five children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as soaps, frozen food, tinned food, snacks, drinks, etc. She has been doing this for two years. 

Mile needs a loan to buy a second-hand pick-up to assist in running her business. She hopes to use her profits to extend and improve her business and to pay for her children's education. She became a member of SPBD in 2002 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy a second-hand pick-up for her business.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy is a 21-year-old woman who is single and has one child. She runs a business sewing two-piece dresses, men's trousers and children's clothes in her community. She has two years of experience with this business. 

Dorothy has requested a loan to buy materials, threads, needles and a new sewing machine. She plans to use her profits to buy new materials for her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, threads, needles and a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en: Luisa is 23 years old, married and the mother of two children. She runs a small business selling ice cakes in her community and has been doing this for the last three years. Luisa has requested a loan to buy a freezer, foam cups, cordials and sugar. She joined SPBD in 2008 to gain access to capital for her business. With these additional earnings, Luisa will have money to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, foam cups, cordials and sugar

loans.name: Asenati

texts.en: Asenati is a 52-year-old divorced woman with five children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Asenati has requested a loan to buy taro crops, chemicals, a wheel barrow, a backpack sprayer, a crowbar, and bush knives. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Asenati hopes to improve her family's standard of living and provide for them financially.

loans.use: to buy taro crops, chemicals, a wheel barrow, a backpack sprayer, a crowbar, and bush knives

loans.name: Sesilia

texts.en:
Sesilia is a 57 year old married woman with 9 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Sesilia has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, knives, rakes and taro crops. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Sesilia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, knives, rakes and taro crops.

loans.name: Lagafuaina

texts.en: Lagafuaina is 39 years old, married, and has six children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community, and she has been doing this for many years. Lagafuaina has requested a loan to buy a canoe, spears, fishing nets, and snorkels. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Lagafuaina will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy a canoe, spears, fishing nets, and snorkels

loans.name: Fesuiai

texts.en:
Fesuiai is a 26 year old woman living with her partner and 2 children. She has a small plantation and grows peanuts to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. 

Fesuiai has requested a loan to buy a rake, peanut seeds, fertilizer, gloves, a wheelbarrow and barbed wire. She became a member of SPBD in 2014. With her profits, Fesuiai hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy rake, peanut seeds, fertilizer, gloves, wheelbarrow and barbed wire.

loans.name: Maupenei

texts.en:
Maupenei is a 40-year-old married woman with six children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Maupenei has requested a loan to buy bush-knives, fertilizer, rakes, chemicals, taro shoots, and vegetable seeds. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. With her profits, Maupenei hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy bush-knives, fertilizer, rakes, chemicals, taro shoots, and vegetable seeds

loans.name: Solialii

texts.en:
Solialii is a 45-year-old married woman with seven children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Solialii has requested a loan to buy taro shoots, fertilizer, rakes, chemicals and pay her kids' school fees. She has been a member of SPBD since 2008. With her profits, Solialii hopes to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy taro shoots, fertilizer, rakes, chemicals and pay her kids' school fees

loans.name: Seilona

texts.en: Seilona is 57 years old, married, and has seven children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro, banana, and other crops that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for many years. Seilona needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, empty water gallons, tarpaulin, bush knives, and a crowbar. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013. Seilona will use the profits from her sales to help provide for her family's everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, empty water gallons, tarpaulin, bush knives, and a crowbar

loans.name: Puapuagatia

texts.en:
Puapuagatia is a 46-year-old married woman with six children. She grows cabbages, tomatoes and cucumbers in her community to earn a living. She has many years of experience with this business. 

Puapuagatia needs a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, fertilizer, chemicals and a garden hose. She plans to use her profits to help her children's education. 

Puapuagatia has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, fertilizer, chemicals and a garden hose.

loans.name: Luatala

texts.en:
Luatala is a 43-year-old married woman with two children. She makes and sells ice cakes and pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has many years of experience with this business. 

Luatala needs a loan to buy a freezer chest, cordials, foam cups, sugar, and school fees. Lautala has been a member of South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) since 2014. 

She plans to use her profits to provide for her family's daily needs and to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chest freezer,cordial,foam cups,sugar and school fees

loans.name: Tavau

texts.en:
Tavau is 49 years old and married with three children. 

She makes and sells elei printed lavalava (sarongs) to earn a living and has been doing this for many years. 

Tavau has requested a loan to buy material, colored paints, board, brushes, and stencils. She joined South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) in 2014 to gain access to financial services. 

She plans to use her profits to help with her children's education.

loans.use: to buy material, colored paints, board, brushes, and stencils

loans.name: Eseta

texts.en: Eseta is a 50-year-old widow with 3 children. She has a business selling tins of fish, powder, flour, sugar, salt, ice cream, ice pops, chicken legs, etc. She has requested a loan to buy ice cream, noodles, milk, soft drinks, snacks, sugar, salt, rice, tins of fish, mosquito coils, toilet paper and onions. Eseta will use her profits to improve her business and provide her family's financials. Eseta joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy ice cream, noodles, milk, soft drinks, snacks, sugar, salt, rice, tins of fish, mosquito coils, toilet paper and onions

loans.name: Lovi

texts.en: Lovi is a 19-year-old lady with no children. She has a small business of pool games.  She has been in this business for two years.Lovi needs a loan to buy a new pool table for her business.  She will use her profits to help her family's living and improve her business.Lovi joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new pool table

loans.name: Stephanie

texts.en: Stephanie is a 20-year-old woman who is single. She has no children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience in this kind of business. Stephanie needs a loan to buy flour, baking soda, eggs, a large basin, sugar, and a large frying pan. She will use her profits to improve her business and support her family. Stephanie joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour, baking soda, eggs, a large basin, sugar, and a large frying pan

loans.name: Vaaiga

texts.en:
Vaaiga is 22 years old and married with two children. She has a small garden where she grows cabbages, taro, yams, bananas and other items that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Vaaiga needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives, a backpack sprayer, barbed wire and a crowbar. 

She joined SPBD in 2010. Vaaiga will use the profits from her sales to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizer, bush knives, a backpack sprayer, barbed wire and a crowbar

loans.name: Palepa

texts.en:
Palepa is a 41-year-old woman who is single with no children. She runs a business selling tin fish, chicken, milk, soft drinks, etc. in her community. She has 2 years of experience with this business. 

Palepa has requested a loan to buy soy sauce, flour, butter, snacks, soft drinks, onions, chicken, milk, noodles and cigarettes. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and support her family financially. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy soy sauce, flour, butter, snacks, soft drinks, onions, chicken, milk, noodles and cigarettes.

loans.name: Fualilia

texts.en:
Fualilia is a 36-year-old married woman with three children. She runs a small business selling meat buns in her community and has been doing this for three years. 

Faulilia has requested a loan to buy flour, cooking oil, a large cooking pot, a new oven, onions, salts and chicken. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fualilia will try and expand her business so that she can get more profit to help with her business and her family too.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, a large cooking pot, a new oven, onions, salts and chicken.

loans.name: Meripa

texts.en: Meripa is 20 years old and single with no children. She wants to start her small business making and selling chips in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy raw bananas, taro, dripping oil, salt and a large frying pan. In the future, Meripa hopes to use her business profit to improve her business and support her family financially. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy raw bananas, taro, dripping oil, salt and a large frying pan.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a 28-year-old lady with no children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years.

Edna has requested a loan to buy chemicals and weed spray, a wheelbarrow, spade and axe. 

She became a member of SBPD in 2014. With her profits, Edna hopes to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy chemicals and weed spray, and a wheelbarrow, spade and axe.

loans.name: Tiresa

texts.en: Tiresa is a 42 year old mother of one child. She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tiresa has requested a loan to buy fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, shovels, gloves, rakes, bush knives and mist blower. She has been a member of SPBD since 2008. With her profits, Tiresa hopes to help her family meet everyday needs and to pay for her child's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, a wheelbarrow, shovels, gloves, rakes, bush knives and mist blower.

loans.name: Tracey

texts.en: Tracey is 22 years old and single with no children. She has a business selling tin fish, powder, flour, sugar, salt, ice cream, ice pops, chicken legs, etc. She has requested a loan to buy tin fish, milk, noodles, laundry soap, cigarettes and soft drinks. Tracey will use her profits to help her family and to improve her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2014

loans.use: to buy tin fish, milk, noodles, laundry soap, cigarettes and soft drinks.

loans.name: Sesilia

texts.en: Sesilia is 37 years old and married with four children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as freezer goods, groceries, etc. She has been doing this for many years. Sesilia needs a loan to buy snacks, soft drinks, candy, sugar, rice salts and coffee. She hopes to use her profits to provide her children with education. She became a member of SPBD in 2013 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, candy, sugar, rice salts and coffee.

loans.name: Malaea

texts.en:
Malaea is a 46-year-old married woman with 3 children. She has a small business, selling elei lavalava in her community. She has 2 years of experience in this line of business.

Malaea needs a loan to purchase materials, an elei carved board, stencils, color paints and a paint roller. She hopes to use her profits to help her family needs. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to purchase materials, an elei carved board, stencils, color paints and a paint roller.

loans.name: Temukisa

texts.en:
Temukisa is 48 years old and married with 5 children. She makes and sells elei printing materials to earn a living and has been doing this for 1 year. 

Temukisa has requested a loan to buy materials, color paints, an elei carved board and stencils. She plans to use her profits to improve her business and provide for her children's education. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, color paints, an elei carved board and stencils.

loans.name: Faavae

texts.en:
Faavae is a 58-year-old woman who is married with four children. She runs a business sewing  in her community. She has many years of experience with this business. 

Faavae has requested a loan to buy fabric material, a new sewing machine, needles and threads. She plans to use her profits to help with her family's needs. She joined SPBD in 2008 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy fabric material, a new sewing machine, needles and threads.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a 54-year-old woman who is single with 1 child. She runs a business of sewing clothes and selling them in her community and to the public. She has 2 years of experience with this business. 

Rosalina has requested a loan to buy an overlock-sewing machine, threads, needle packets, a measuring tape and materials. She plans to use her profits to improve her ongoing sewing business. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy an overlock-sewing machine, threads, needle packets, a measuring tape and materials.

loans.name: Etevise

texts.en:
Etevise is 42 years old and married with 4 children. She has a small business of making and selling chips in her community.  She has 2 years of experience.  Etevise needs a loan to buy bananas, taro, salt, plastic bags, oil and a large basin. 

In the future, Etevise hopes to use her business profits to improve her business and financially support her family. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy bananas, taro, salt, plastic bags,  oil and a large basin.

loans.name: Matata

texts.en:
Matata  is a 41-year-old woman and lives with her partner  and 8 children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu and yams to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Matata requests a loan to buy fertilizer, chemicals,a wheelbarrow, gloves, a spade and a rake. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2007. With her profits, Matata hopes to extend her house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, gloves, a spade and a rake.

loans.name: Ruta

texts.en: "Ruta is a 42 year old married woman with 5 children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has 4 years of experience with this business. Ruta needs a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, oil, gas oven and containers. She plans to use her profits to help her family. Ruta has been a member of SPBD since January 2014."

loans.use: to buy bag of flour, sugar, yeast, oil, gas oven, and containers

loans.name: Avau

texts.en: Avau is a 48-year-old married woman with 6 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Avau has requested a loan to buy bush knives, weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since January this year, 2014. With her profits, Avau hopes to earn more money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, weed sprayer, chemicals and seeds

loans.name: Lisiti

texts.en: Lisiti is a 29-year-old single woman with 1 child. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than 2 years. Lisiti has requested a loan to buy bush knives, weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since January this year, 2014. With her profits, Lisiti hopes to earn more money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, weed sprayer, chemicals and seeds

loans.name: Lotoifale

texts.en: Lotoifale is a 20-year-old single woman with 2 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for two years. Lotoifale has requested a loan to buy bush knives, weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since January this year, 2014 With her profits, Lotoifale hopes to earn more money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, weed sprayer, chemicals and seeds

loans.name: Sau

texts.en: "Sau is 42 years old and married with 5 children. She runs a small business selling B.B.Q in her community and has been doing this for 3 years. Sau has requested a loan to buy cases of chicken legs, soy sauce, onions and tomato sauce. She joined SPBD in January this year 2014 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Sau will support her family."

loans.use: to buy cases of chicken legs, tomato sauce, soy sauce and bags of onions

loans.name: Itagia

texts.en: "Itagia is a 68-year-old married woman with 9 children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living. She has 4 years of experience with this business. Itagia needs a loan to buy flour, sugar and yeast, cooking oil, baking powder and gas oven. She plans to use her profits to help her family. Itagia has been a member of SPBD since January 2014. "

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, cooking oil, baking powder and gas oven

loans.name: Mefaaiu

texts.en:
Mefaaiu is a 48-year-old single woman with 2 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has done this for two years. 

Mefaaiu requests a loan to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012 . With her profits, Mefaaiu hopes to earn more money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, a weed sprayer, and chemicals.

loans.name: Omeka

texts.en:
Omeka is a 62-year-old married woman with 11 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has done this for two years. 

Omeka requests a loan to buy bush knives, a weed sprayer, a wheelbarrow and chemicals. She has been a member of SBPD since January 2014. Omeka hopes to earn more money to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, a weed sprayer, chemicals, and a spade.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet, age 49, prepares and sells snacks and finger foods to earn a living. She has been cooking and selling these kinds of items in her community for the past three years. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital and has seen her business flourish as a result. 

She and her husband have seven children.

Janet has requested a loan in order to buy chicken, soy sauce, sausages, rice, flour, salt, onions, noodles, tomato sauce, and chicken wings. 

With her increased earnings, Janet will be better able to meet the needs of her family and to continue to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chicken, soy sauce, sausages, rice, flour, salt, onions, noodles, tomato sauce, and chicken wings

loans.name: Nafanua

texts.en:
Nafanua Lefulefu is 38 years old married woman with seven children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as lavalava, shirts, make- up, souvenirs, etc. She has been doing this for three years.

Nafanua needs a loan to provide more exciting products to improve the quality of her business. She hopes to use her profits to support her family and to improve her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy more  lavalava, shirts, make-up, earrings, souvenirs, etc.

loans.name: Itualaefia

texts.en:
Itualaefia is a 35-year-old married woman with 7 children. She has a small plantation and grows tomatoes, round cabbage, corn, green onions and green beans to earn a living. She has been doing this for a year. Itualaefia has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, a garden hose, a wheelbarrow, a shovel and gloves.

She joined SPBD in 2014. With her profits from the loan, Itualaefia hopes to increase her income, which will allow her to improve her business and help her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, a garden hose, a wheelbarrow, a shovel and gloves.

loans.name: Faava

texts.en: Faava is a 18 years old and single with no children.  She runs a small business selling BBQs in her community and has been doing this for 4 years.  Faava has requested a loan to buy a bbq grill, chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, soy sauce, garlic onions, tomato sauce, foam plates and foil.  She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital.  With her earnings, Fava will look at improving her business and also help her family.

loans.use: to buy bbq grill, chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, soy sauce, garlic onions, tomato sauce, foam plates and foil

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is 48 years old and married with 5 children.  She runs a small business selling meat bun in her community and has been doing this for 2 years.  Lina has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, dripping oil, baking soda and a frying pan.  She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital.  With her earnings, Lina will provide for her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, dripping oil, baking soda and a frying pan

loans.name: Saumaleula

texts.en: Samalaeulu is 30 years old and is married with no children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. Samalaeulu has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, baking soda, vanilla, eggs and a frying pan for her business. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Samalaeulu will provide for her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, baking soda, vanilla, eggs, and a frying pan for her food business.

loans.name: Palolo

texts.en: Palolo is 53 years old and married with 6 children. She owns and operates a sewing business. She has 2 years of experience in this line of work. Palolo needs a loan to buy a new sewing machine, thread, needles, and other materials. She hopes to use her profits to improve her business and improve her kids' education. She joined SPBD in 2013.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, thread, needles, and other materials for her sewing business.

loans.name: Solofua

texts.en: Solofua is 31 years old and single with five children. She runs a small business selling meat-cake in her community and has been doing this for two years. Solofua has requested a loan to buy chicken, dripping oil, soy sauce and garlic and onions for her business. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Solofua will use her business profit to help her business and her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken, dripping oil, soy sauce and garlic and onions

loans.name: Akenese

texts.en:
Akenese is a 20-year-old woman, married with two children. She has a small plantation and grows taro and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. Akenese has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, chemicals, fertilizer, a crowbar, a pickaxe and bushknives.
 
She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profit Akenese hopes to save for family daily needs.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, chemicals, fertilizer, a crowbar, a pickaxe and bushknives

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en: Emelia is a 50-year-old married woman with 10 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana and yam to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. Emelia has requested a loan to buy new chemicals, weedkiller, knives, a wheelbarrow and a spade. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Emelia hopes to save for her children's education and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy new farm inputs

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Dais, a 43-year-old married mother of five, has been operating a sewing business in her community for many years. She has requested a loan to buy an over lock-sewing machine, threads, materials, needles and fabric color paints. 

Daisy plans to use her profits to help her children's education. She joined SPBD in 2008 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy an overlock-sewing machine, threads, materials, needles and fabric color paints.

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie is a 37-year-old woman with seven children. She owns and operates a small flea market, selling items such as lavalava (traditional Polynesian cloth worn as a skirt by men and women), shirts, makeup, handicrafts, Samoan weapons, etc. She has been doing this for three years. 

Julie needs a loan to buy materials, Samoan earrings, bangles, Kava bowls, Samoan weapons, tapa cloth, and elei carved board. She hopes to use her profits to support her family and kids. She became a member of SPBD in 2014 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy materials, Samoan earrings, bangles, kava bowls, Samoan weapons, tapa cloth, and elei carved board.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a 21-year-old married woman with three children. She makes and sells curry, rice, and potato chips in her community to earn a living. She has three years of experience with this business. 

She joined South Pacific Business Development (SPBD) this year. Esther needs a loan to buy rice, chicken, curry powder, garlic, onion, potatoes, cooking oil, and salt. 

She plans to use her profits to save for her kids' education.

loans.use: to buy rice, chicken, curry powder, garlic, onion, potatoes, cooking oil, and salt

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en: Theresa is a 42-year-old married woman with 4 children. She runs a business of sewing clothes and selling them in her community and to the public. She has 2 years of experience with this business. Theresa has requested a loan to buy materials, threads, needles, and a overlock sewing machine. She plans to use her profits to improve her ongoing sewing business. She recently joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, threads, needles, and an overlock sewing machine

loans.name: Malia

texts.en: Malia is a 77 year old widow with 8 children. She has a small plantation and grows bananas, taamu, yams, etc to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Malia has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, barbed wire, a backpack sprayer and empty water gallon containers.  She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Malia hopes to assist her family financially.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow,barbed wire,a backpack sprayer and empty water gallon containers

loans.name: Sunema

texts.en:
Sunema is a 50-year-old married woman with six children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, bananas, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. 

Sunema has requested a loan to buy chemicals, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, backpack sprayer, and crowbar. 

She became a member of SPBD in 2014. With her profits, Sunema hopes to provide her family with everyday needs and to help her children's education.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, bush knives, a wheelbarrow, backpack sprayer, and crowbar.

loans.name: Fetuli

texts.en: Fetuli is 26 years old and a partner with two children. She wants to start a small business making and selling meat buns in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy flour, garlic, onions, soy sauce, and chicken. In the future, Fetuli hopes to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy flour, garlic, onion, soy sauce, and chicken.

loans.name: Eseta

texts.en: Eseta is 30 years old and single, with one child. She has a business selling tinned fish, powder, flour, sugar, salt, ice cream, ice pops, chicken legs, etc. She has requested a loan to buy chicken,sausages,soft drinks,toilet paper,snacks,laundry powder,mosquito coils,milk,noodles, and cigarettes. Eseta will use her profits to help her family and children's education. She has been a member of SPBD since 2014.

loans.use: to buy chicken,sausages,soft drinks,toilet paper,snacks,laundry powder,mosquito coils,milk,noodles, and cigarettes.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is 26 years old and married with two children. She has a small garden where she grows vegetables that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. Naomi needs a loan to buy a garden hose, vegetable seeds, a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, a rake and gloves.
 
She became a member of SBPD in 2014. Naomi will use the profits from her sales to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a garden hose, vegetable seeds, a wheelbarrow, fertilizer, rake and gloves

loans.name: Penina

texts.en: Penina is 43 years old and married with five children. She runs a small business selling fish, crabs, and octopus in her community and has been doing this for three years. Penina has requested a loan to buy fishing net, spears, goggles, snorkel gear and a new canoe. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Penina will help her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, spears, goggles, snorkel gear and a new canoe

loans.name: Leapuna

texts.en: Leapuna is a 43-year-old woman who is married, with four children. She has a small business, a taxi service. Leapuna needs a loan to buy new tires, her taxi registration and seat covers. She will use her profits to help raise her family's standard of living and improve her business. Leapuna joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new tires, her taxi registration and seat covers

loans.name: Helena

texts.en:
Helena is 26 years old and married. She has five children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items like frozen goods and groceries. She has been doing this for four years.

Helena needs a loan to buy chicken, flour, salt, sugar, sausages, onions, noodles, milk and soft drinks. She hopes to use her profits to improve her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2014, to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell at her store, including chicken, flour and sugar

loans.name: Elizabet Ignacia

texts.es: La señora Elizabet tiene 37 años, casada con un hijo de la edad de 16  años, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa variedad de shorts, ella vende sus productos en distintas ferias de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la señora Elizabet,  va a usar este préstamo para compra de ropa Shorts al por mayor y así surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su mercadería, la señora Elizabet enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando  mercadería y así de esta manera genera más ingresos económicos, se siente feliz ya agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan para crecer en su actividad, mejorara sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Elizabet is 37 years old, married, and has a 16-year-old son. She offers a variety of shorts that she sells at different fairs in the cities of La Paz and El Alto.

This loan is her first transaction with Emprender. Sra. Elizabet will use the loan to buy shorts in bulk so that she can restock her business. Her reason for requesting this loan is to increase her inventory of merchandise. Sra. Elizabet faces challenges in her business, such as dealing with the competition. She will use the profits to continue buying merchandise so that she can generate more income.

Elizabet is pleased and appreciates the opportunity that has been given to her so that she can grow her business. As a result, her earnings will improve as well as the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy shorts in bulk.

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic is 40 years old. He is married to Susan Wanjiru and together they have three children aged 11 and seven years and 10 months respectively. Dominic runs a shop and a green grocery business, he has been in the business for the last 13 years and makes a monthly income of KES. 25,000 .

This is his 10th loan with Vision Fund Kenya and he plans to purchase stock for his shop. He will use the anticipated profits to open another business in a different location and also to repay back the loan. 

He hopes and dreams of owning a chain of businesses and for his family to live a comfortable life.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock for his shop and grocery

loans.name: Nyadzua

texts.en:
Nyadzua is a 47 year old general trader in Kilifi Kenya. She is a married woman whose spouse provides additional income and together they support five children. For the past thirty four years she has been in this business and has done well.

This marks her fourth loan after repaying the previous loans successfully. She will use the requested loan to purchase stock of dry maize, beans and green grams, sacks of sugar and cooking fat and the anticipated profit to add more stock in her shop. She hopes to have a happy and financially stable family.

loans.use: to purchase stock of dry maize, beans and green grams, sacks of sugar and cooking fat

loans.name: Percy

texts.en: Percy helps her husband generate income with her retail store, while he farms to make a living. She sells different kinds of grocery goods and she earns a good income from this. She has also successfully repaid her previous loan that she used to improve her business.Aside from this retail store, Percy has had a motorcycle where her husband used for  transportation business and she also used it to transport her purchased goods of her business. Recently, she borrowed a loan to buy new tires for the vehicle . She hopes to help uplift her family and have a better future.

loans.use: to buy new tires

loans.name: Marife

texts.en: Marife helps her husband to earn money in many ways. She has been working in a private company and has had help working the farm on weekends. She used her previous loan from GDMPC to buy fertilizer and has successfully repaid it. Marife and her husband plan to engage another line of business, so they paid their current loan earlier in order to request a higher amount . Without hesitation, she borrowed a new loan to buy a motorcycle to use for a transportation business. She hopes to expand their farm and become successful in their business.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Yvette

texts.en:
Yvette is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration in a university in Mindanao. She wants to pursue her studies and with Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC), she finds it easy. 

Yvette borrowed a new loan from GDMPC to pay her school tuition fees for the second semester. 

In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family.

loans.use: to pay her school tuition fees.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
To make a living, Mary Grace helps her husband in their fishing business. They have been doing this for more than nine years as their main source of income. She earns well from this, to provide for the family and she had successfully repaid her previous loan from Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC). She used her loan to purchase fishing materials. 

Currently, Mary Grace has taken a new loan  to buy new engine motor of their fishing boat in order to improve her business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy new  engine motor of their fishing boat

loans.name: Ursesia

texts.en: Ursesia is married to a farmer and lives in Dipolog City. She runs a general store to earn additional income for the family. She joined GDMPC and had borrowed a loan to purchase additional grocery goods to resell. She wants to improve her business and to be able to have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to resell

loans.name: Reina

texts.en: Reina runs a general store while her husband is a farmer and works as carpenter at the same time. She has been selling different kinds of grocery goods in their community to make a living. After joining GDMPC this year, she borrowed a loan to purchase rice and corn grits to add her inventory. Improving her business is her determination and she want to make it possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice and corn grits to add to her her inventory

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda raises pigs for sale while her husband is a farmer and a part-time carpenter. They have had to work hard to provide for their children's needs and to send them to school. She has successfully repaid her previous loans that she used to repair her pigs' shelter. 

Recently, she has taken a new loan to buy piglets and feeds. She is thankful to GDMPC for supporting her plans to become successful. She hopes to earn more income to improve her standard of living in the future.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feeds

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.en: To make a living, Fortunata helps her husband to manage their own farm. They have been doing this for more than 20 years and make good earnings, allowing her provide for her family and successfully repay her previous loan used for post-harvest costs. Currently, Fortunata took a new loan to buy organic fertilizer and a new variety of seeds. She wants to improve the general living condition of the entire family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and a new variety of seeds

loans.name: Candido

texts.en: Candido is married with two children. He operates a buy and sell business while his wife is vending food to make a living. He has been buying pigs and cattle to resell in the market for six years and he earns well from this. Candido borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit and used it as additional capital to buy more livestock to sell. His picture was taken with his motorcycle which he uses to cart away his purchased livestock. On his vacant time he used this vehicle for transportation services business. He plans to own a stall in the town market where he can sell meat. He wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to get additional capital to buy more livestock to sell.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en: To make a living, Ruben manages his own farm, growing and harvesting rice. He has been doing this for many years. He has only one child and he wants to see his child be successful in the future. To buy fertilizer and organic  pesticides, Ruben borrowed a loan from GDMPC, which he had joined recently. He is hopeful to earn more profit from the farm to provide for the needs of his family and improve his general living situation in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
To make a living, Jovelyn sells snacks in their village and has been doing this for more than four years. She earns a good income from this and she has successfully repaid her previous loan used to buying stuff to resell. 

Currently, she has taken a new loan to purchase raw ingredients to make snacks to sell. In the future, with her improved income, she will be able to meet for her family's needs.

loans.use: purchase raw ingredients to make snacks to sell.

loans.name: Ricarel

texts.en: Ricarel has the ambition of finishing his studies and having a successful life in the future. He is studying  in a university in Ozamiz City, taking up a Bachelor of Science in Marine Technology. He has six siblings and this is the reason Ricarel wants to help the family to uplift their living conditions. He joined GDMPC and has borrowed a new loan for tuition fees and SOLAS (Safety of Life at Sea - training) costs. In the future, Ricarel wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: for tuition fee and SOLAS costs

loans.name: Aloha

texts.en: To make a living, Aloha operates a mini grocery store that sells all kinds of food and refreshments. She has been in the business for more than three years. Aloha earns well and has successfully repaid her previous loan used in purchasing stocks. Currently, she took a new loan to buy additional grocery goods to sell. In the future, she hopes that she can be a stockholder of refreshment products in their community.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Prince Joseph

texts.en: Prince Joseph wants to finish his studies for a better life in the near future. He is studying Information Technology  at Christian Mindanao College. His determination of improving their quality of living makes him eager to face the challenges in order to continue dreaming. He joined GDMPC and borrowed a new loan to pay the school tuition fees for the second semester this school year. In the future, he wants to improve the general living situation of his family.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fees

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en: Reynaldo is studying Information Technology at Christian Mindanao College. With five siblings in the family, life is not at all easy for him but his determination makes him strive to pursue his dreams. He joined GDMPC and has borrowed a new loan to pay the school tuition fee for the second semester this school year. Reynaldo hopes to finish his studies and find a better career in the future.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fee

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
To make a living, Analyn operates a motorcycle transport service in her local community. She earns well from this and has successfully repaid her previous loan used to buy tires. Aside from this, she also helps her husband working on their own farm, growing and harvesting bananas, which is their main source of income. 

Analyn took a new loan from GDMPC to replant bananas and to pay for farm fertilization. Aloha wants to improve the farm to ensure a better source of income in the future.

loans.use: to replant bananas and to pay for farm fertilization.

loans.name: Emely

texts.en: To make a living, Emely helps her husband with her manufacturing business selling woven nipa in their village. She has been doing this for more than three years and she earns well for the family. She borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional palm leaves. She hopes to cater orders and demands this season. In the future, she wants to repair their house for a better and comfortable living.

loans.use: to buy additional palm leaves

loans.name: Ethel

texts.en: To make a living, Ethel manages her own business weaving and selling nipa (palm leaves) in her village. Doing this for three years, she has been able to support the needs of her family. Ethel borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional palm leaves. In the future, she wants to improve and expand her business to gain more income for the family.

loans.use: to buy additional palm leaves

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: To make a living, Helen manufactures and sells woven nipa (palm fronds) in her community. She earns well from this and has successfully repaid her previous loan, which she used to buy materials. Aside from this, she is engaged in a retail business, selling grocery goods. Helen took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional grocery goods to sell. She plans to expand her business to have a better living condition for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Juvy Lynn

texts.en:
Juvy Lynn is married with four children and operates a general store in her village selling assorted grocery goods to make a living. After three years in the business, she earns well enough to provide for the family. 

She borrowed a new loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy additional grocery goods to sell. She always finds ways to augment the general living conditions of the family. She wants to improve the business to ensure a better source of income.
