In the future, Marissa wants to improve the general living situation of the family as well as improving the success of their children.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is a widow with seven children who operates her own farm with the help of her family. For more than ten years in farming, she earns well for their basic needs. In order to gain more, she had to engage another line of business aside from farming alone. She buys coconuts from her neighbors in addition to her harvest and sell them in town. 

Recently, she borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy more coconuts to sell to augment her business. She is looking forward to earning more and wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family in the future.

loans.use: to buy more coconuts

loans.name: Rovie

texts.en: Rovie is married with two children and operates a general store to make a living. She also has a farm and her husband works as a security guard for a private company. She earns a better income, but she has to save more for the education of her children in the future. In order to improve the business, Rovie borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional grocery goods to sell. Rovie is looking forward to a better future. She works with effort and great determination to provide a better living for the entire family.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en: Angelita is a single entrepreneur who operates a general store to make a living. She has been running the store for more than four years earning well for her needs. She never stops making improvements to her business. She joined GDMPC and has borrowed a loan to buy additional grocery goods and other home supplies to sell. She wants to improve the business in order to have a better source of income in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods and other home supplies to sell.

loans.name: Beth

texts.en:
Beth, a married woman with three children, helps her husband in operating their own farm while he works as a private driver to make a living. For more than five years, she has earned a good income to provide for the family. She finds ways to improve their living and the farm as well because it is their main source of income. 

Beth joined GDMPC recently and she has borrowed a loan to purchase seeds and pay for fertilization costs. 

Beth is looking forward to the improvement and expansion of their farm to earn more and have a better source of income for the family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and pay for fertilization costs.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en: To make a living, Edgar operates a service based business which provides transportation services in his community. He earns well from this to pay for the needs of his family. His wife works as a teacher in their village and the couple shares all the expenses for the improvement of the family. However, Edgar did not save any money for vehicle maintenance. In order to buy new tires, he borrowed a loan from GDMPC. Edgar thinks of the possibilities of having another vehicle to expand his business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy new tires.

loans.name: Apolinaria

texts.en:
Apolinaria is married and operates their own farm while her husband works as a carpenter to make a living. For ten years she has been growing and selling vegetables and other crops. She earns a good income to provide for her family.  

She needs improvement of the farm to ensure a better source of income. Without hesitation, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to pay for seeds and fertilization costs for this cropping season. Apolinaria hopes for a better future for the entire family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Bienvinido

texts.en:
Bienvinido is a 40-year-old married man who manages his own farm to make a living. For many years he has been growing and harvesting coconuts and other crops, and he earns a better income for the family. 
He personally delivers his farm produce in town in order to make more money. Bienvinido also uses his motorcycle to visit his farm, as well as delivering his produce.
Recently he has borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy tires for his vehicle which is used for carrying farm supplies and produce. With the micro finance services of GDMPC, a better future awaits the family of Bienvinido.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle, used for carrying farm supplies and produce

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
For more than three years, Editha has earned an income from her retail store in her village. She has completely repaid her previous loan, which she used to improve her business. In addition to her store, Editha has a farm where she grows different types of crops as her main source of income. 

Currently, Editha is borrowing a new loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer for the farm. While awaiting the harvest, she is very busy attending to her retail business. She is happy with this.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina has been selling cosmetic products in her village to make a living. Aside from this, she has been engaged in selling grocery goods in her retail store and she earns well from this. She has successfully repaid her previous loan used in her beauty products business. In order to improve her retail store, she borrowed a new loan from GDMPC to buy more grocery goods to sell. To oversee her business is her passion, for it brings a better and improved living situation for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy more grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Joeris

texts.en:
To make a living, Joeris helps her husband operating their own farm. For more than four years in farming, the couple has earned a better income for their family. Joeris has successfully repaid her previous loan, which she used for farm inputs. 

Despite having a better income, Joeris still needs to buy seeds and pay fertilization costs for the next cropping season. To make this happen, she has taken a loan from GDMPC, which she joined in 2010. She is thankful to GDMPC for extending better services to farmers to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pay fertilization costs

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
To make a living, Lolita has been operating a general store in their village while her husband is farming. She also helps her husband to manage their rice production business. She earns well from this, and she has successfully repaid her previous loan which was used to improve the general store. She has had to put in a lot of effort and investment in order to earn a better living. 
Currently, she is taking out a new loan to purchase seeds and to pay fertilization costs for their rice production. Lolita is hopeful of making a better living with her family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, and to pay fertilization costs for rice production

loans.name: Ma. Amie

texts.en: To make a living, Ma. Amie has grown and harvested bananas for more than seven years. She earns well from this and was able to support her four children's needs. She also has successfully repaid her previous loan used for the farm. She was determined that improving their farm would help her receive more income in return. Recently, she borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to finance weeding maintenance and post-harvest costs.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to finance weeding maintenance and post-harvest costs

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
To make a living, Merlyn has been vending foodstuffs in their village while her husband works as a private driver. She has a better income from this to provide for her family. She successfully repaid her previous loan used for the business. She also accepts orders for made-to-order foods of different types in order to earn more. 

Currently, she took out a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy raw ingredients to prepare snacks and specialty food items for sale. She hopes to improve the general living situation of her family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to prepare snacks and specialty food items for sale

loans.name: Rachell

texts.en:
Rachell is married with five children. She operates a retail store while her husband works as a private driver to make a living. 

While she has been in this business for many years, she has been unable to expand. She has had many expenses, especially for the needs of her children. 

In order to improve the business, she took a new loan from Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) to buy additional grocery goods to sell. 

She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving as it will be a great help .

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Russel

texts.en:
To make a living, Russel grows bananas on her own farm, while operating a general store in her village. In that way, she and her husband help one another to raise their children and give them everything they need. Russel earns a better income from this and she had successfully repaid her previous loan, used to improve the business.  

Currently, Russel has taken a new loan from Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

In the future, she wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa, a manicurist who also has a general store, earns well from her business while her husband does farming. She has successfully repaid her previous loan, used in her service-based business. Currently, she took out a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy more colors of nail polish to enhance her services. 

In the future, she hopes to have a great opportunity to  increase profits and improve her family's lives.

loans.use: to buy more colors of nail polish

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en: Ellen is married and has three children. She operates the family's farm while her husband works as a private driver to make a living. Ellen has been farming for six years and she earns a good income to provide for the family's needs. She joined GDMPC and borrowed a new loan to buy organic fertilizer to boost the farm. She awaits an abundant harvest with the efforts and investments she made for the improvement of the farm. Ellen wants to improve the entire family's general living situation.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en: Jaime has been providing transportation services in his community. He earns well from this for him to provide for his family. Jaime also has a coconut farm.  He has an only child and was determined to send his child to school to have a better future. He borrowed a loan from GDMPC microcredit to renew licenses used in transportation. Jaime wants to have more income to have a better life with his family in the future.

loans.use: to renew licenses used in transportation

loans.name: Alda

texts.en:
Alda helps her husband operate a farm, where they grow and harvest bananas, coconuts and vegetables. Her husband works as a security guard during the week and on their farm on weekends. Alda has earned a good income from the farm for many years to provide for her family. She wants to improve the farm to ensure a better source of income in the future.

Alda currently took out a new loan to buy organic fertilizer to boost the farm. She wants to improve the entire family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Cresilda

texts.en:
Cresilda is married with two children. She works as a teacher and does daily tutoring to make a living. For three years, she has earned well from this to provide for her family. She always finds ways to improve their situation. Currently, she borrowed a loan from GDMPC to buy materials for tutoring.

In the future, she wants to buy a motorcycle to use for her transportation.

loans.use: to buy materials for tutoring.

loans.name: Rodulfo

texts.en:
Rodulfo has been selling food for many years and he earns well to provide for his family. He has also been engaged in retailing to improve his business. Rodulfo has successfully repaid his previous loan, which he used to buy ingredients and beverages.

Rodulfo has borrowed a new loan from GDMPC microcredit to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve his family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
To make a living, Josephine used to take care of her hog-raising business, earning well for the family. With her earnings, she was able to start selling grocery goods in her general store. 

She has successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying feed for her livestock. Currently, she took a new loan from GDMPC Micro Credit to purchase additional grocery goods and feed to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated with her loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods and feed to sell

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
A 54-year-old, Carmelita with four children helps her husband working on their own farm to make a living. For twenty years of growing coconut, the couple earns well for them to provide for the family. 

Recently, she joined GDMPC and gained access to micro finance services and borrowed a loan to purchase organic fertilizer.

She wants to maintain and improve the farm to ensure a better source of income for the family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma has been selling food and snacks at the terminal in town. She earned a good enough income from this that she was able to provide her children with a better education. She has also successfully repaid her previous business loan.Gemma never saved her profit to add to her capital because she had to spend it on her children's needs.

Gemma has taken out a new loan to buy more snacks to resell. She looks forward to the improvement of her business through this additional capital. Gemma plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy snacks to resell

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married with two children and operates a general store while her husband does farming to make a living. For two years in running the business, Gina has earned well to support her husband's income. She had to improve her business in order to gain more returns for the education costs of her children. 

Recently, Gina took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional grocery goods to sell.

In the future, she wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en: Alicia operates a general store, earning a good income for the family and enabling her to repay her previous loan successfully. Alicia used her previous loan to buy additional goods for the store and she found ways to improve the business to earn more in return. Recently, she took out a new loan to buy additional grocery goods to sell. In the future, Alicia wants to ensure a better source of income for the family by expanding and improving her business.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Roger Sr.

texts.en:
Roger Sr. is married with eight children and operates a business providing motor transportation in his community. He has been in business for six years and has been able to provide for his family. Recently, he joined GDMPC and took out a loan to buy new tires and other accessories like a raincoat.

Roger Sr. always wants the best for the family and in the future, he wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to buy new tires and other accessories like a raincoat

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en: To make a living, Jovita owns and operates a general store in herr village. She used her previous loans to improve her business and had successfully repaid them. Supervising the business personally is not easy but with love the love and help of her family, she has been able to continually improve it. Recently, she took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase beverages and more grocery goods to sell. In the future, she would like to sustain and improve the business to ensure a better source of income.

loans.use: to purchase beverages and more grocery goods to sell
